alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 7:31PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marin, northwestern Alameda, western Contra Costa and northeastern San Francisco Counties through 800 PM PST... At 730 PM PST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Sausalito, or 7 miles north of San Francisco, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 730 PM PST, a trained spotter near Sausalito reported a mix of graupel and hail causing slick roadways. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Richmond, Alameda, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Sausalito, Strawberry, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley and Belvedere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
